## AABB.getClipStateWithFrustumMask() method

Do a clip test at the AABB and a frustum.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getClipStateWithFrustumMask(frustum: Frustum, mask: number): ClipState;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  frustum | [Frustum](doc/markdown/./base.frustum.md) | The frustum object. |
|  mask | number | The frustum planes that needs to be tested. |

**Returns:**

[ClipState](doc/markdown/./base.clipstate.md)

The clip test result.
